title: Gaza: Child Killed, Fires, Flooding, and Cold Claim Lives, as Israel restricts Shelter Materials
description: Medical staff attributed her death to extreme cold as a powerful winter storm continues to batter the Strip
content: ( IMEMC ) – A Palestinian child was killed by Israeli fire in northern Gaza on Thursday, as worsening winter conditions and unsafe displacement shelters led to the deaths of a woman, her daughter, an… [+3067 chars]
de: Gaza: Getötete Kinder, Brände, Überschwemmungen und Kälte fordern Menschenleben, da Israel die Bereitstellung von Notunterkünften einschränkt. Das medizinische Personal führte ihren Tod auf extreme Kälte zurück, während ein heftiger Wintersturm weiterhin über den Strip fegte
en: Gaza: Child Killed, Fires, Flooding, and Cold Claim Lives, as Israel restricts Shelter Materials. Medical staff attributed her death to extreme cold as a powerful winter storm continues to batter the Strip
la: Gaza: Puer occiditur, ignes, Diluvium, et frigus Vitas clamat, sicut Israel tegimen Materias restringit. Medicus baculum suum morti tribuit frigidissimo, sicut vehemens tempestas hiemalis pergit quatere Strip

title: Hospital flu cases drop as NHS on cold weather alert
description: NHS bosses say the fall is welcome, but expect freezing temperatures to increase pressure on the health service.
content:
Nick TriggleHealth correspondent
The number of patients in hospital with flu has fallen in England, but NHS bosses are warning the cold snap could increase the pressure on the health service in the … [+2303 chars]
de: Krankenhausgrippefälle gehen zurück, da der NHS auf Kältewarnung hinweist. NHS-Chefs sagen, der Rückgang sei willkommen, gehen jedoch davon aus, dass die Temperaturen unter dem Gefrierpunkt den Druck auf das Gesundheitswesen erhöhen werden.
en: Hospital flu cases drop as NHS on cold weather alert. NHS bosses say the fall is welcome, but expect freezing temperatures to increase pressure on the health service.
la: Hospitium flu casuum stillant sicut NHS in tempestate frigoris intenti. NHS bullae dicunt casum gratissimum esse, sed expectes torpore temperaturas ut pressuram augeant in servitio sanitatis.

title: Florida cold snap sends iguanas tumbling from trees on New Year’s Eve
description: A sharp cold snap sent temperatures plunging across the state, stunning cold-blooded iguanas and knocking them from trees in South Florida.
content:
Florida rang in the New Year under an Arctic chill and the cold delivered one of the Sunshine States strangest spectacles: iguanas falling from the sky.
A sharp cold snap sent temperatures plunging … [+3563 chars]
de: Der Kälteeinbruch in Florida lässt Leguane am Silvesterabend von Bäumen fallen. Ein heftiger Kälteeinbruch ließ die Temperaturen im ganzen Staat sinken, was kaltblütige Leguane betäubte und sie von Bäumen in Südflorida warf.
en: Florida cold snap sends iguanas tumbling from trees on New Year’s Eve. A sharp cold snap sent temperatures plunging across the state, stunning cold-blooded iguanas and knocking them from trees in South Florida.
la: Florida frigus frangitur mittit iguanas de arboribus in Novo anno in Eva decidentis. Snaculus acutus frigus misit temperaturas trans statum mersas, iguanas frigidas attonitas et eas ab arboribus in Florida Australi pulsans.

title: Does fish thaw faster in water or in air?

Die uralte Frage: Tauen Fische im Wasser schneller auf als in der Luft? hat eine eindeutige Antwort: Fisch taut in kaltem Wasser deutlich schneller auf als bei Raumtemperatur, aufgrund der besseren Wärmeübertragung des Wassers …

The age-old question of does fish thaw faster in water or in air? has a definitive answer: Fish thaws significantly faster in cold water than at room temperature, due to water’s superior heat trans…

Perantiqua quaestio de piscibus an citius in aqua vel in aere emittitur? responsum definitivum habet: Pisces resolvit signanter velocius in aqua frigida quam in cella temperie, propter caloris superioris aquae trans…

title: Subscription fatigue is real, and 2026 will be the breaking point for artists
description: Endless fees, shrinking value, and better alternatives are changing the market.
content: We've all been there. Hunched over the laptop at midnight, surrounded by cold tea and half-finished work, you check your inbox. Suddenly, the number of “your subscription is increasing” emails starts… [+4708 chars]
de: Die Abo-Müdigkeit ist real und 2026 wird für Künstler der Wendepunkt sein. Endlose Gebühren, sinkende Werte und bessere Alternativen verändern den Markt.
en: Subscription fatigue is real, and 2026 will be the breaking point for artists. Endless fees, shrinking value, and better alternatives are changing the market.
la: Subscriptio lassitudo vera est, et 2026 punctum artificum fractio erit. Feoda infinita, valorem praebentes, et meliora mutantur forum.

title: Cold snap postpones Boreham Wood & Scunthorpe games
description: Saturday's National League games at Boreham Wood and Scunthorpe are postponed because of frozen pitches.
content:
Boreham Wood's top-of-the-table National League fixture against York City on Saturday has been postponed because of a frozen pitch at the Mangata Developments Stadium.
The National League leaders ha… [+538 chars]
de: Kälteeinbruch verschiebt Spiele von Boreham Wood & Scunthorpe. Die National League-Spiele am Samstag in Boreham Wood und Scunthorpe werden wegen zugefrorener Spielfelder verschoben.
en: Cold snap postpones Boreham Wood & Scunthorpe games. Saturday's National League games at Boreham Wood and Scunthorpe are postponed because of frozen pitches.
la: Frigora franguntur, Boreham Wood & Scunthorpe ludos prorogat. Saturni ludi nationalis Achaici apud Boreham Wood et Scunthorpe ob vocum congelatas prorogantur.

title: Expect Soon Another PIK Paper Claiming Warming Leads To Cold Snaps Over Europe
description: So, you see warming also leads to unusual cold and harsh winter events across Europe
content:
From the NoTricksZone
By P Gosselin
Winter across Europe has been on the mild side so far just as predicted by global warming alarmists. But now the weather is about to turn cold.
A cold winter sp… [+3054 chars]
de: Erwarten Sie bald ein weiteres PIK-Papier, in dem behauptet wird, dass die Erwärmung zu Kälteeinbrüchen über Europa führt. Sie sehen also, dass die Erwärmung in ganz Europa auch zu ungewöhnlich kalten und strengen Winterereignissen führt
en: Expect Soon Another PIK Paper Claiming Warming Leads To Cold Snaps Over Europe. So, you see warming also leads to unusual cold and harsh winter events across Europe
la: Expecto mox Alius PIK Paper Dicens Warming Leads Frigidum Snaps Per Europam. Vides itaque calefacere etiam ad insolitum frigus et asperam eventuum hiemalium per Europam

title: Sick of winter? January thaw coming for eastern half of US
description: Temperatures are likely to be much warmer than average across a wide expanse of the country into much of next week.
content:
Folks sick of winter's cold should see a reprieve from the icy weather the week of Jan. 5, forecasters said.
Temperatures are likely to be much warmer than average across a wide expanse of the count… [+3512 chars]
de: Haben Sie den Winter satt? Im Januar kommt es in der östlichen Hälfte der USA zu Tauwetter. Die Temperaturen dürften in weiten Teilen des Landes in weiten Teilen der nächsten Woche weit über dem Durchschnitt liegen.
en: Sick of winter? January thaw coming for eastern half of US. Temperatures are likely to be much warmer than average across a wide expanse of the country into much of next week.
la: Aeger hiems? Ianuarias venientem ad dimidium orientale US CALEFACTO. Temperaturae verisimile esse multo calidiores quam mediocris per latitudinem regionis in multa septimana proxima.

title: How do cold weather health alerts work?
description: The weather alert service warns the public when high or low temperatures could damage their health.
content:
Amber health alerts covering much of England have been issued by the UK Health Security Agency (UKHSA).
The alerts mean cold weather is likely to have a significant impact on health and social care … [+3040 chars]
de: Wie funktionieren Gesundheitswarnungen bei kaltem Wetter? Der Wetterwarndienst warnt die Bevölkerung, wenn hohe oder niedrige Temperaturen gesundheitsschädlich sein könnten.
en: How do cold weather health alerts work?. The weather alert service warns the public when high or low temperatures could damage their health.
la: Quomodo frigoris salutem summis operantur?. Tempestas servitio vigilans admonet rem publicam, cum altae vel humilis temperaturae suae valetudini laedere posset.

title: How to look after dogs, cats and other pets in cold weather
description: Pets may need help to stay warm and safe when wintry conditions arrive.
content:
Many parts of the UK have experienced cold and snowy weather this winter. 
Like people, pets can need extra help to stay warm and safe during wintry conditions. 
How do I keep my pet warm indoors?… [+4063 chars]
de: So kümmern Sie sich bei kaltem Wetter um Hunde, Katzen und andere Haustiere. Haustiere benötigen möglicherweise Hilfe, um warm und sicher zu bleiben, wenn winterliche Bedingungen eintreten.
en: How to look after dogs, cats and other pets in cold weather. Pets may need help to stay warm and safe when wintry conditions arrive.
la: Quomodo quaerere canes, feles et alia cura frigoris. Cura opus est auxilio ut calidum et securum manere cum condiciones hiemales advenerint.

title: Double record-breaking year for UK as 2025 confirmed as warmest and sunniest on record
description: Simon King looks back at the extreme weather the UK had during 2025 as the Met Office confirms it as the warmest and sunniest on record
content:
In early November the weather was particularly mild with above average temperatures, especially overnight.
On Bonfire Night, traditionally a time to wrap up warm to watch fireworks, temperatures wer… [+979 chars]
de: Doppeltes Rekordjahr für Großbritannien, da 2025 als wärmstes und sonnigstes seit Beginn der Aufzeichnungen bestätigt wurde. Simon King blickt auf das extreme Wetter zurück, das Großbritannien im Jahr 2025 erlebte, da das Met Office bestätigte, dass es das wärmste und sonnigste seit Beginn der Aufzeichnungen war
en: Double record-breaking year for UK as 2025 confirmed as warmest and sunniest on record. Simon King looks back at the extreme weather the UK had during 2025 as the Met Office confirms it as the warmest and sunniest on record
la: Duplex record-fractionis annus pro UK sicut 2025 confirmatus est sicut calidissimus et sunnissimus in memoria. Simon Rex extremam tempestatem in UK quam in 2025 respicit, sicut Met Office confirmat eam ut calidissimas et aptissimas in memoria.

de: Die Warnzeichen kalter Hände und Füße sollten Sie niemals ignorieren. Ein Arzt verrät, wann Sie sich in diesem Winter über extreme Verfärbungen oder Schmerzen an Händen oder Füßen Sorgen machen müssen
en: The warnings signs of cold hands and feet you should never ignore. A doctor reveals when to worry about extreme discolouration or pain in the hands or feet this winter

title: Snow, frost and ice across Germany as cold snap continues
description: Germany has been gripped by a spell of wintry weather. As the cold snap shows no sign of abating soon, residents should prepare for several more days of challenging conditions.
content:
Germany has been gripped by a spell of wintry weather. As the cold snap shows no sign of abating soon, residents should prepare for several more days of challenging conditions.
 Over the past few da… [+3439 chars]
de: Schnee, Frost und Eis in ganz Deutschland, während der Kälteeinbruch anhält. Deutschland ist von einer winterlichen Wetterperiode erfasst. Da der Kälteeinbruch keine Anzeichen dafür zeigt, dass er bald nachlässt, sollten sich die Bewohner auf mehrere weitere Tage mit schwierigen Bedingungen einstellen.
en: Snow, frost and ice across Germany as cold snap continues. Germany has been gripped by a spell of wintry weather. As the cold snap shows no sign of abating soon, residents should prepare for several more days of challenging conditions.
la: Nix, gelu et glacies per Germaniam sicut franguntur frigidae pergunt. Germania hiberna tempestate correpta est. Sicut frigus frangeretur ostendit nullum signum cito mitescere, incolas pluribus diebus condiciones provocationes parare debet.

de: Laut IMD verzeichnet Indien im Dezember 68,9 % unterdurchschnittliche Niederschläge. Das India Meteorological Department prognostiziert einen kälteren Januar 2026 als üblich mit verstärkten Kältewellenbedingungen und unterdurchschnittlichen Temperaturen …
en: India records 68.9% below-average rainfall in December, IMD says. India concluded December 2025 with a significant rainfall deficit, particularly in Northwest and Central regions. The India Meteorological Department forecasts a colder-than-usual January 2026 with increased cold-wave conditions and below-average temperatures…
la: Indiae meminit 68.9% infra mediocris pluvias mense Decembri IMD dicit. India Decembri 2025 conclusa cum notabili pluviarum defectuum, praesertim in regionibus septentrionalibus et Centralibus. Indiae Department Meteorologicum praenuntiat frigidiores solito Ianuarii 2026 cum conditionibus frigidioribus auctis et temperaturis infra-medium.
